content: this text is a legal document that summarizes the progress of a cause involving two parties mr p and ms kf they have requested a notary to record their proceedings the recent court judgment granted them a divorce which will be recorded in the civil status records database as part of the divorce settlement agreement a property was allocated to one of the parties along with a lump sum payment of 190000â‚¬ the parties have agreed to exempt the registration of this agreement from the general administration patrimonial documentation they have also acknowledged their obligations regarding tax returns and registration fees the market value of the property is 380000â‚¬ the parties have confirmed their arrangements and a certificate has been issued the notary has verified the parties identities and recorded their personal information the parties have paid a fee of €100 for the notarys services the document is three pages long
